phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
Asta and the others finally arrived at the Underwater Temple.
But once they got there...
You guys are after the magic stone, are not you?
If you want it, why do not we play a little game?
and nine temple mages were waiting for them!
The high priest told Asta and the other Black Bulls, who were separated,
that if they wanted the magic stone, they must battle the temple mages, nine-on-nine.
Victory goes to the first team to wipe out the other team,
or whichever team has the most members left in the end.
Yay!
This is awesome!
A blood-soaked battle!
I am super pumped!
Nine?
There should be ten of us...
We are missing one.
That is so easy to understand!
All right!
Bring it on!
That is funny...
I cannot seem to sense any magic from you.
Guess I picked a loser.
Want To find out if I am actually a loser or not?
Temple Battle Royale
Now, then, why do not we watch from here?
I have got plenty of food and drink!
Hey, you old geezer, do not leave me out of the game!
I got all pumped up, but now I am sad.
You are a bit too strong.
All the people outside, as well as myself, are very excited for this game.
It would be no fun if it were to end quickly.
Looks like you really do get it, gramps.
You have got good taste.
I do, do not I?
Ooh, it looks like a few match-ups have already begun.
All right.
If any of mine lose, I will kill'them.
So cold...
Damn that geezer.
He is going to pay for this!
Hilarious!
You are at a total disadvantage with fire magic in a place like this.
Looks like I win.
I would rather not pick on frail-looking guys like you.
Are you going to fight me?
I know you guys.
You are the Black Bulls, are not you?
You are the weakest of the Magic Knights.
Marie's waiting for me.
Hurry up and come at me, damn it.
Just so you know, it is pretty pointless for you to wave around that rusty sword.
My mollusk magic can parry any kind of attack.
I see...
Is not this exciting?
Oh, by the way, what are your knights' ranks?
They are all junior magic knights.
I am surprised you even know about that, living down here.
According to your ranking system,
my temple mages would be more powerful than intermediate knights!
Those juniors do not stand a chance!
What?
Really?
Well, that is not good...
Unless those idiots are actually stronger than usual for their titles.
Wh-Wh-Wh-What?!
Do not think I am going to get discouraged just because I am surrounded by water.
I am going to serve all of you up like grilled fish!
He must have been one of the weaker ones.
So... I wonder where all the strong ones are?
Good grief.
I need to finish this nonsense quick so I can go back to doting on Marie.
This... is not right...
My mollusk magic should be able to deflect any kind of physical attack.
My sword is anti-magic!
That junk will not work!
What?
Next, next!
Good job, you idiots!
Beat the crap out of them!
Those fools let down their guard!
Hey, gramps, I forgot!
We should bet on which team is going to win!
I bet 10,000 yuls on the Bulls!
Grr...
The battle's just begun!
They will not be able to defeat the remaining priests so easily!
Especially the Three Great Priests, who are on par with senior knights.
Badump, badump...
Sneak, sneak, sneak, sneak...
Whew...
Man, that was close.
There is no way I could fight a guy who looks that strong.
I have been trying to get to the places I marked outside, but I cannot for some reason.
That means I can only use my spatial magic to get to places I can see.
Oh, I forgot to mention this,
but you will not be able to leave my playground until the game's over.
Whoa!
Are you watching me, gramps?!
Hey, Finral, why the hell are you hiding?
Hurry up and fight, or I will kill you!
Huh?
Yami?!
Wait, are you with the old guy?
We are enjoying some food and drinks while we watch you guys fight.
What?!
Come on, make him stop this violent game!
What?
It is fun to watch because it is so violent.
That is right!
When did you two hit it off so well?!
It is definitely no fun if you are not going to fight.
Do not let that coward get away.
There we go!
Nuisance spell activated.
Game Magic: Monster Toy.
Scary!
How entertaining!
I should use more of these!
Hey, you old geezer...
Let us do this one next.
This will probably kill them!
Are you sure you are actually on their side?
Nice drawing, though.
Now, then...
Let us see how the others are holding up.
That bastard Grey turned into a crab, and I do not know where he went,
so I will just have to kill him later.
Oh?
Is Charmy battling?
S-Such destructive force...
Th-The Underwater Temple is amazing.
And so is its seafood!
S-So good!
Munchy, munchy...
This is the best I have ever had!
So this is the Underwater Temple's seafood!
I wish my meal-saving prince could have some, too!
Okay!
This entire ecosystem is mine!
I am going to eat absolutely everything!
That one there...
What exactly is she doing?
Heave-ho!
Heave-ho!
What a huge haul!
Found you!
La?
My, what a cute little target.
I almost feel bad that I am going to defeat you.
So you are finally here.
But right now, I am overflowing with undersea mana.
If you want me to chew you up the way I chewed up those fish,
bring it on!
Song Magic: Mother Lullaby.
I feel so nice...
Why, yes, I can still eat more...
One down!
Just so you know, sleeping counts as a K.O.
How do you like the power of one of my Great Priests?
She is not getting any food for a week.
Now, then...
I wonder if I will see those two next.
All right!
My clothes are finally dry!
Let us see...
Who am I going to fight next?
Hey, Luck.
I guess you are still alive.
Yup!
I defeated one of the enemy guys already.
I headed this way because I felt a strong presence over here, but...
Looks like I was right...
All right... let us decide who gets a piece of'them fir
Hey!
No fair, Luck!
You bastard!
Ya snooze, ya lose, Magna!
Lightning Magic: Thunderbolt Destruction!
Water Creation Magic: Sea God's Shield.
It is tough!
My lighting should work pretty well against water, though.
Well, well, are not you lively?
What the heck are these things?!
This ki...
Someone is there.
Come on, Grandpa.
Do you really have to hit us with your nuisance spells, too?
Well, whatever.
That was a good warm-up.
Hup!
He took out something that huge?
Who the heck is he?
Hey, there!
You are Asta, right?
Huh?
Yeah, that is right...
I have heard about you!
You use a strange sword that cancels out magic, right?
Uh, yes...
Wait, who would you hear that from?!
Never mind that!
Check out this dance!
The hell?!
He just started dancing!
But it is a really cool dance!
Do you think they would like this dance up on the surface, too?
Heck yeah!
The name's Kiato!
My dream's to become a dancer who captivates the whole kingdom!
He just started talking about his dream?!
Although people from the Underwater Temple can go to the kingdom's beaches,
we cannot go to the capital.
It is against the rules.
But if we win this fight, Grandpa said...
Oh, the high priest is my grandpa.
Anyway, he said we could use the high priest's authority to go up to the surface!
I am going to make a name for myself and become a super famous dancer!
He just told me all about this huge dream!
Hey, wait a sec...
This all seems pretty familiar.
So listen...
I am going to take you down for the sake of my dream!
He is fast!
I have my own dream, too!
Huh?
I want to become the strongest man who protects the Clover Kingdom,
the Wizard King!
So for that dream...
I am going to take you down!
I like it!
Then let us bet our dreams on a head-to-head showdown!
Bring it on!
Wh-What am I going to do?
I have not learned a single attack spell yet.
Hey, there!
I finally found you!
Sh-Shoot!
I am in trouble!
Y-You want to take on a royal such as myself?
You have got some guts!
This is your chance to run away if you want!
First off, I am glad you could make it, Noelle!
H-How do you know my name?
Oh, right.
I guess you cannot tell with this thing on my face.
Huh?
Kahono!
I have been waiting for you, Noelle!
Kahono...
I had no idea you were from the Underwater Temple.
Why did you help me learn magic?
I was actually looking for people who wanted to come to the Underwater Temple
while I practiced singing on that beach.
You see, when we have guests, Grandpa...
I mean, the high priest, always holds games.
If I win, I will be able to go to the surface
and make my dream to become an idol come true!
Your dream?
Then you used me?!
Huh?
No.
It is true that I wanted to help you, since you were working so hard,
and it is also true that I wanted to become friends with you.
But from now on, we will fight fair and square as opponents in this game!
No!
We are supposed to be friends!
Yup!
Friends are people who can clash over things that are precious to them,
but keep smiling together even then!
Song Magic: Mother Lullaby.
What is this spell?
I-It is going to make me...
Water Creation Magic: Sea Dragon's Lair!
Now you are ready to fight?
Song Magic: Destructive Beat!
Come on, now, Noelle!
You will never win if you just keep defending!
What do you think you are doing?!
She only let off some magic energy, but look at that force!
Amazing!
Huh?
What are you doing, Noelle?
An attack like that will not have any effect on me.
Aim straight!
That sucked!
Shut up!
I still cannot control my magic when I am attacking, you idiot!
That is not it.
You are already controlling your magic, Noelle.
Huh?
You are subconsciously trying not to attack people.
You must not want to hurt anyone.
But are you sure you are okay with that?
Why did you come here, Noelle?
Did not you come here to make something come true?
If you do not fight for it and win it,
you will never get what you want!
Fine!
This guy's really strong!
And what is with his moves?
It is like his mind's gone somewhere else.
It is really hard to read his ki!
I think he is even throwing off my senses.
Is this his magic?
It is just like I thought.
If you are going up against a real sword,
your anti-magic sword is nothing more than a lump of iron!
And if I add in my dance magic, you will not be able to follow my moves!
How do you like my grandson?
Is not he strong?
Yeah, the kid definitely knows how to handle a sword.
But...
Come on, now!
Just surrender already, Asta!
This is not good!
I am about to lose!
He really is like water.
There is no way to catch him...
Wait, maybe brute strength is not the way to go here!
I probably should not try to capture water, since it has no distinct shape!
Anyway, I need to calm down.
That is it!
I will also become like water!
Monkeying around will not get you anywhere!
Do not sell a monkey short!
I cannot use magic!
And that is why...
I will recreate magic with my body!
Pretty sure there are limits when you cannot use magic!
What?
In that case...
I will use this chance...
to go beyond my limits!
Jeez...
Just how athletic is this kid?
My idiot's ability to pick things up quick is even greater!
What a rude man...
Trying to set up a sneaky trap for a defenseless woman like me.
You cannot really complain if you fall for a trap yourself, can you?
Seriously?
Vanessa's usually drunk and useless before she gets warmed up.
We are in top shape today.
I should have bet more, damn it.
These guys are not junior mages at all!
But man, that lady's got some nice boobies.
Hey, old man.
Could you get that magic stone ready?
A really dangerous lot called the Eye of the Midnight Sun is after that stone.
It would be in your best interests to just hand it over to us.
The best part of a game is turning the tables.
You cannot get lamer than bluffing, old man.
I am not bluffing!
If my son and grandkids get serious, we will turn things around in an instant!
My son is the strongest mage of the Underwater Temple!
Uh-oh...
I think you are getting tired, Magna.
You can take a little break.
I could not feel better, you idiot.
You butt out, Luck.
Sorry to drag you into my dad's game like this.
Dad?
You are that geezer's son?
He is strong...
His magic is as deep as the sea.
No doubt about it...
He is definitely the strongest one here.
You two should come at me at once.
I would rather not hurt you any more than I need to.
At the very least, I will end all this in an instant.
Water Creation Magic: Sea God's Hammer!
You are not ending anyone, you bastard!
I am not done having fun yet!
Huh?
Wh-What was that?
Wh-Wh-What the heck's going on?!
Looks like you are having fun.
Why do not you let us join in?
Petit Clover!
Why Do not You Let Us Join In?
Why Do not You Let Us Join In?
Looks like you are having fun.
Why do not you let us join in?
Munchy, munchy...
La?
I-I must have come to the wrong place.
Munchy, munchy...
Have a bite.
Have a bite,'kay?
Well, if you insist, I guess I will... join in.
I will let you join in...
After you stir that pot.
Those who will not work do not get to munchy!
Stir, stir, stir...
Put your back into it!
It is not all about strength!
I see...
This is quite deep.
And so, Vetto realized his dream to become a chef and gave up on the magic stone.
Then everyone lived happily ever after!
That probably will not happen, huh?
Of course not!
To make the Eye of the Midnight Sun's dream come true,
I, Vetto of the Third Eye, shall obtain the magic stone!
Black Clover, Page 44: The Pointlessly Direct Fireball and the Wild Lightning.
Page 44 The Pointlessly Direct Fireball and the Wild Lightning
My beast magic shall destroy everything!
